TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当列表中的项发生更改时， 事件发生。An event occurs whenever the item in a list is changed. 例如，当列表项的文本更改为新值时，将发生此事件。For example, this event will occur when the text of the list item is changed to a new value. 由于要添加新项，将项移动到列表中的新位置时，不会引发此事件。This event is not raised when the item is moved to a new position within the list because of a new item being added. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `CurrencyManager1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CurrencyManager1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#191](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#191)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#191](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#191)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 指示列表中更改项的位置。

span.span: Indicates the position of the item being changed within the list.

value.span: 更改项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index to the item being changed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `CurrencyManager1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CurrencyManager1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
